title: Fullstack software engineer
desc1: Hey! I'm a Brazilian who is passionate about building high-impact, well-performing user experiences.
desc2: I believe that work is a big portion of my day, so I try to make the best out of it for me and my colleagues.
desc3: To achieve that I focus on empathy during conversations and try to deliver something I'm happy with.
howConfortable: How confortable I'm with each technology
nonExhaustive: Non-exhaustive list of languages, technologies and tools
basedonCEFR: Based on CEFR language proficiency levels

whatsetsmeapart.title: What sets me apart?
whatsetsmeapart.reason1: I demonstrate strong performance so colleagues can rely upon me.
whatsetsmeapart.reason2: I'm self-motivated with a passion for learning and using both front and back-end technologies.
whatsetsmeapart.reason3: I'm a systems thinker who can reason through systems and understand technical tradeoffs.

workexp.notlisted: There is one freelance working experience that is not listed.

bucksense.name: Bucksense
bucksense.desc: Developing high-traffic cruise booking platform for Crystal Cruises with international cross-functional team.
bucksense.highlight1: Improved performance scores by ~20 points through image optimization, UI caching, and dynamic imports
bucksense.highlight2: Reduced Algolia API costs by ~30% through optimized search caching and server-side strategies
bucksense.highlight3: Strengthened payment gateway reliability with comprehensive testing suite covering multi-country scenarios

sejaGudi.name: Seja Gudi - Cultural Platform
sejaGudi.desc: Led end-to-end development of a multi-platform social network for cultural events and recycling initiatives.
sejaGudi.highlight1: Built cross-platform apps using React Native (mobile) and Next.js (web) with shared business logic
sejaGudi.highlight2: Integrated geolocation services for event discovery and admin dashboard with role-based permissions
sejaGudi.highlight3: Connected Mercado Livre API for payments and reward systems with multi-currency support

quattrus.name: Quattrus
quattrus.desc: Led frontend team migration from ExtJS to Next.js for enterprise management applications.
quattrus.highlight1: Eliminated ExtJS licensing costs and improved maintainability with modern web standards
quattrus.highlight2: Increased page load speed by ~40% using hybrid rendering and Vercel deployment with CI/CD
quattrus.highlight3: Created private company-wide design system with Tailwind CSS and led AI-powered document platform development

alex.name: Alex Rohleder LTDA
alex.desc: Led migration of legacy Create React App to Next.js for energy company platform managing seasonal student programs.
alex.highlight1: Designed hybrid architecture to run old and new applications in same codebase with shared translation engine
alex.highlight2: Enhanced caching strategies, optimized webpack, and integrated Firebase for authentication and real-time data
alex.highlight3: Established automated E2E, unit, and snapshot tests reducing regression bugs during peak usage

speedCast.name: Speedcast
speedCast.desc: Contributed to Speedcast Compass, enterprise portal for monitoring and managing remote satellite networks.
speedCast.highlight1: Transformed legacy system into modern, responsive web application with improved data visualization
speedCast.highlight2: Integrated ArcGIS API for real-time 3D satellite positioning and coverage monitoring
speedCast.highlight3: Designed modules to process big data into downloadable reports (CSV, XLSX) for network analysis

switchApp.name: Switch App
switchApp.desc: Enhanced hospitality recruitment platform connecting professionals to job opportunities using React.js, Node.js, and PostgreSQL.
switchApp.highlight1: Developed payment slip and PDF document management features ensuring local payment standards compliance
switchApp.highlight2: Modernized UI components and improved responsiveness contributing to higher user retention rates
switchApp.highlight3: Collaborated with product team to refine layouts and enhance platform usability across devices

lucalto.name: Lucalto
lucalto.desc: Contributed to development and launch of Inkhall, a niche social network for tattoo artists.
lucalto.highlight1: Helped bring platform from concept to production enabling early user adoption in target community
lucalto.highlight2: Gained hands-on experience with Next.js, Supabase, and Prisma ORM in startup environment
lucalto.highlight3: Implemented authentication flows, database models, and responsive layouts while learning cross-functional collaboration

autofill.title: Job autofill
autofill.desc1: App made in Electron.js to automatically fill job forms

linkedinJobBot.title: LinkedIn Job Application Bot
linkedinJobBot.desc1: An AI-powered bot that automatically applies for job openings on LinkedIn
linkedinJobBot.desc2: Automated job search, application submission, and customized cover letter generation

wishApply.title: WishApply - AI Job Application Platform
wishApply.desc1: Revolutionary AI-powered job application platform that automates the entire job search process
wishApply.desc2: Smart bot applies to hundreds of relevant LinkedIn jobs while you relax
wishApply.desc3: Advanced machine learning with stealth technology for undetectable, authentic applications
